text: As It Is In Life is a 1910 American silent drama movie directed by D. W. GriffithAs It Is in LifeAS IT IS IN LIFE and stars George Nichols, Gladys Egan, and Mary Pickford. ==Actors== *George Nichols - George Forrester *Gladys Egan - George Forrester's Daughter as a young girl *Mary Pickford - George Forrester's Daughter as a young woman *Marion Leonard - George Forrester's Sweetheart *Charles West - George Forrester's Son-in-Law *Kate Bruce - The Maid *William J. Butler *W. Chrystie Miller - Man *Anthony O'Sullivan - Farm Worker *Frank Opperman - Companion of Daughter's Husband *Mack Sennett - Owner of a Pigeon Farm (unconfirmed) ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1910 drama movies Category:American silent movies Category:American drama movies Category:Movies set on farms Category:Movies directed by D. W. Griffith
title: As It Is In Life
